about_the_game:
The gameplay of this game is very unique, by placing bombs with a cross shaped explosive range to destroy enemies and brick walls, and ultimately find an exit. By using props to strengthen one's abilities, the originally weak characters can gradually grow, but if one is not careful, they may be shattered to pieces. The most frustrating thing inside is not being killed by the enemy, but being blown up by oneself. Especially when I am stuck in a dead end and cannot see the King of Hell immediately, I can only wait for the moment when the bomb I set down by my own wrongdoing slowly explodes.

1. Beautiful graphics and attractive gameplay;

2. Carefully designed game levels;

3. Many monsters will stop you;

4. Eliminate all monsters in the game and find the escape door;

5. When props and gates are bombed, a large number of more powerful monsters will appear;

6. Players can freely control their character's movement and release bombs to explode;

7. Multiple types of props, players can accumulate props in each level to gain stronger abilities
